Summary: 2 light ball first still and after moove and dissolve into sky
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rimini
There were no other sightings in Rimini on or around August 1st 2009
divs: Sighting Detailstwo balls (red) coparse in the sky, equally spaced. still for a minute, they do not move, nearly moon. increase in intensity of light becomes very bright as the moon Then, they move slowly and dissolve in a southerly direction at about 20 km away, first fell in intensity light, bright back then. no light position. no aircraft or balloon When they were above us you could see that the ball of fire was surrounded by a ring and the center was brighter.
